summary: The 'NOPAIN for Veterans Act' aims to ensure the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) provides non-opioid pain medications to veterans. It mandates that the VA include eligible non-opioid pain management drugs and biological products, as defined in the bill, in its national formulary and drug standardization list.  The bill also places a limitation on the use of funds for these amendments. It requires the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to implement the amendments within 90 days of enactment.
